channel.title: How to make requirments for items
channel.description: I need to know exactly how to do this, i want to make like my all my vesta armor, statius, and morrigan's armors to be lvl 70 to use them. I already used "wearing" in the source and put all the names in.. Still does not work? Someone show me or tell me how? Btw I have teamview too :) thanks

item.title: How to make requirments for items
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

If you could, that would be so cool please do teamviewer with me!

Read full topic

item.title: How to make requirments for items
item.dc:creator: @Xandra Xandra
item.description:
@Xandra wrote:

yeah,
search

public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

and scroll down a little and youll see something like

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("")) { return 20;

and you need to add it in there.

Then Search

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {

and do the same exact thing

Ill do teamviewer if u need to.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make requirments for items
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

nope nothin at all. I typed in “Vesta’s Platebody” and here is my example i have.

} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Vesta’s Platelegs”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Statius’s Platebody”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Statius’s Platelegs”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Statius’s full helm”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Dharoks platebody”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Rune platebody”)) {
return 40;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Rune plateskirt”)) {
return 40;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Rune kiteshield”)) {
return 40;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Rune platelegs”)) {
return 40;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Elysian Spirit Shield”)) {
return 90;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Dharoks platelegs”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Vesta’s Platebody”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Zuriel’s robe bottom”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Zuriel’s Robe”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Zuriel’s hood”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Morrigan’s Top”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Morrigan’s chaps”)) {
return 70;
} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Morrigan’s coif”)) {
return 70;

and nothing… please help.
